code: @Test public void clientRegistrationRepositoryBeanShouldBeCreatedWhenPropertiesPresent() {     this.contextRunner.withUserConfiguration(OAuth2ClientRegistrationRepositoryConfiguration.class).withPropertyValues(REGISTRATION_PREFIX + ".foo.client-id=abcd", REGISTRATION_PREFIX + ".foo.client-secret=secret", REGISTRATION_PREFIX + ".foo.provider=github").run((context) -> {         ClientRegistrationRepository repository = context.getBean(ClientRegistrationRepository.class).         ClientRegistration registration = repository.findByRegistrationId("foo").         assertThat(registration).isNotNull().         assertThat(registration.getClientSecret()).isEqualTo("secret").     }). }
